lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Clippers continue to win games without their leading scorer. And whenever Blake Griffin gets rid of those street clothes and returns to the lineup, they'll only get better.

headline.print_headline: Paul Has 25 Points, Clippers Beat Hornets 97-83
headline.main: Paul Has 25 Points, Clippers Beat Hornets 97-83

snippet: The Los Angeles Clippers continue to win games without their leading scorer. And whenever Blake Griffin gets rid of those street clothes and returns to the lineup, they'll only get better....
